lead_paragraph: Jose Mourinho has dropped a heavy hint that Paul Pogba's protracted transfer from Juventus to Manchester United is close to completion.

headline.print_headline: Man United's Mourinho Hints at Pogba Arrival Next Week
headline.main: Man United's Mourinho Hints at Pogba Arrival Next Week

snippet: Jose Mourinho has dropped a heavy hint that Paul Pogba's protracted transfer from Juventus to Manchester United is close to completion....
